title: The Hoodlum (Film-Noir, 1951) Lawrence Tierney, Allene Roberts | Movie

sources.title: The Hoodlum (Film-Noir, 1951) Lawrence Tierney, Allene Roberts | Movie
sources.description:
Paroled sociopath career criminal Vincent Lubeck betrays his family's trust when he masterminds a complex armored car robbery.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/PPlKZODiLfI


Original title:  The Hoodlum (1951)

This film is available with subtitles in many languages

Director: Max Nosseck
Writers: Sam Neuman, Nat Tanchuck 
Stars: Lawrence Tierney, Allene Roberts, Marjorie Riordan
Genres: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir


00:00 Full Movie
07:59 A summary of a film-noir involving a family dynamic, criminal activities, and a new business venture.
14:20 A conversation between characters discussing past experiences and family dynamics.
18:23 A summary of events unfolding in a film-noir involving a man named Vincent and his interactions with others.
23:34 Betrayal and consequences unfold as relationships are tested and secrets are revealed.
30:21 Intrigue unfolds as secrets about Rosa's death and John's passing are revealed during funeral arrangements.
44:24 Uncovering a mysterious plot during a funeral procession leads to unexpected events.
47:26 A dramatic chase unfolds as Vincent Lubeck tries to escape his criminal past.
52:57 A family tragedy unfolds as secrets are revealed and revenge is sought in a film-noir scenario.
